movies.title: Baahubali: The Beginning
movies.actors: Prabhas, Rana Daggubati, Ramya Krishnan, Sathyaraj
movies.plot: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades old feud between two warring people.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.actors: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang
movies.plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
